Articles.Content: I was wondering if there were any mods that add Star Trek style transporters?

I was working on one, gonna pick it up again sometime soon and try to get more community help on it. I was looking into using some code ideas from Deep Freeze to delete/transfer the crew member, but I ran into sort of a The Prestige problem where all I was really able to do was imperfectly clone crew members to two ships

On 3/31/2021 at 3:13 AM, Tompete Kerman said:

I was working on one, gonna pick it up again sometime soon and try to get more community help on it. I was looking into using some code ideas from Deep Freeze to delete/transfer the crew member, but I ran into sort of a The Prestige problem where all I was really able to do was imperfectly clone crew members to two ships

Sounds like a typical Startrek episode.  So... working as intended?
